entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, DIMINISHING TO AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
